definitions.definition: To make ready for a specific future purpose; to set up; to assemble or equip.
definitions.example: We prepared the spacecraft for takeoff.

definitions.definition: To make ready for eating or drinking; to cook.
definitions.example: We prepared a fish for dinner.

definitions.definition: To make oneself ready; to get ready, make preparation.
definitions.example: We prepared for a bumpy ride.

definitions.definition: To produce or make by combining elements; to synthesize, compound.
definitions.example: She prepared a meal from what was left in the cupboards.
